name: Technyra [Nextjs]
blurb: A cloud infrastructure and ecommerce platform company website built with Next.js 15, React 19, and Tailwind CSS. Leverages an MCP server integrated with Figma for design-to-code automation, generating pixel-perfect responsive layouts. Features a custom API handling contact form submissions with Cloudflare Turnstile protection and email service integration. Deployed on Firebase Hosting with comprehensive CSP headers and XSS prevention.
